profile.name: csgo
profile.script: EnablePrimaryMouseButtonEvents(true) function OnEvent(event, arg) if (event == "MOUSE_BUTTON_PRESSED" and arg==1 and IsKeyLockOn("capslock") and IsKeyLockOn("numlock")==false and IsKeyLockOn("scrolllock")==false) then--ak47 --ReleaseMouseButton(2) --PressMouseButton(1) Sleep(99) if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-2,7)--2 Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(2,20) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-1,28) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(3,34) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(7,31) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(8,26) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(5,21) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-10,15) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-33,0)--10 Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-15,0) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-7,0) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-7,0) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-7,0) end elseif (event == "MOUSE_BUTTON_PRESSED" and arg==1 and IsKeyLockOn("capslock") and IsKeyLockOn("numlock") and IsKeyLockOn("scrolllock")==false) then--m4a1 --ReleaseMouseButton(2) --PressMouseButton(1) Sleep(99) if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-1,6)--2 Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-1,6) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-1,9) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-1,17) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-2,18)--6 Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-2,18) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(6,18) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(13,15)--9 Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(15,3) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(0,2)--11 Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-15,0) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-17,0) Sleep(100) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-20,0) end elseif(event == "MOUSE_BUTTON_PRESSED" and arg==1 and IsKeyLockOn("capslock")==false and IsKeyLockOn("numlock") and IsKeyLockOn("scrolllock")==false) then--m4a4 --ReleaseMouseButton(2) --PressMouseButton(1) Sleep(90) if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--1 MoveMouseRelative(2,7) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--2 MoveMouseRelative(-1,10) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--3 MoveMouseRelative(-3,16) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--4 MoveMouseRelative(4,21) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--5 MoveMouseRelative(-5,23) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--6 MoveMouseRelative(0,25) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--7 MoveMouseRelative(6,22) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--8 MoveMouseRelative(15,12) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--9 MoveMouseRelative(30,10) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--10 MoveMouseRelative(-14,0) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--11 MoveMouseRelative(-35,0) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--12 MoveMouseRelative(-25,0) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--13 MoveMouseRelative(-22,0) end elseif(event == "MOUSE_BUTTON_PRESSED" and arg==1 and IsKeyLockOn("capslock") and IsKeyLockOn("numlock")==false and IsKeyLockOn("scrolllock") ) then --ReleaseMouseButton(2) --PressMouseButton(1) Sleep(90) if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-2,7)--2 Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(0,10) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(0,15) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(-5,22) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(0,24) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(6,26) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then MoveMouseRelative(5,18)--8 Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--8 MoveMouseRelative(-4,4) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--9 MoveMouseRelative(0,0) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--10 MoveMouseRelative(10,10) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--11 MoveMouseRelative(0,0) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--12 MoveMouseRelative(0,0) Sleep(90) end if(IsMouseButtonPressed(1))then--13 MoveMouseRelative(0,0) end end end
